data: region | mountains | valleys | gorges | rivers | plains | meadows | plateaux | villages

Zululand is a wild region of mountain ranges, deep valleys and gorges, roaring torrents, rapidly flowing rivers, plains covered with mimosa bushes, meadows where cattle pasture and grow fat, and level plateaux extending for many miles across it, several hundred feet above the level of the ocean; while scattered here and there, in some parts pretty thickly, are to be seen the kraals or villages and the mealy grounds of the natives.
Hendricks the Hunter; Or, The Border Farm: A Tale of Zululand
